members.name: activityDescription
members.descriptionHtml: An element describing the activity that took place. If no activityDescription, activityDescriptionText, or onRenderActivityDescription are included, no description of the activity is shown.

members.name: activityDescriptionText
members.descriptionHtml: Text describing the activity that occurred and naming the people involved in it. Deprecated, use `activityDescription` instead.

members.name: activityIcon
members.descriptionHtml: An element containing an icon shown next to the activity item.

members.name: activityPersonas
members.descriptionHtml: If activityIcon is not set, then the persona props in this array will be used as the icon for the this activity item.

members.name: animateBeaconSignal
members.descriptionHtml: Enables/Disables the beacon that radiates from the center of the center of the activity icon. Signals an activity has started.

members.name: beaconColorOne
members.descriptionHtml: Beacon color one

members.name: beaconColorTwo
members.descriptionHtml: Beacon color two

members.name: comments
members.descriptionHtml: An element containing the text of comments or \@mention messages. If no comments, commentText, or onRenderComments are included, no comments are shown.

members.name: commentText
members.descriptionHtml: Text of comments or \@mention messages. Deprecated, use `comments` instead.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Gets ref to component interface.

members.name: isCompact
members.descriptionHtml: Indicated if the compact styling should be used.

members.name: onRenderActivityDescription
members.descriptionHtml: A renderer for the description of the current activity.

members.name: onRenderComments
members.descriptionHtml: A renderer that adds the text of a comment below the activity description.

members.name: onRenderIcon
members.descriptionHtml: A renderer to create the icon next to the activity item.

members.name: onRenderTimeStamp
members.descriptionHtml: A renderer adds a time stamp. If not included, timeStamp is shown as plain text below the activity.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Optional styling for the elements within the Activity Item.

members.name: timeStamp
members.descriptionHtml: Element shown as a timestamp on this activity. If not included, no timestamp is shown.

members.name: activityContent
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the main container of the activity's description.

members.name: activityPersona
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the persona of the user that did this activity.

members.name: activityText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the activity's description.

members.name: activityTypeIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the icon indicating the type of the activity. Only shown when personas are unavailable.

members.name: commentText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the text of comments.

members.name: doublePersona
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to personas when two users are involved in a single activity.

members.name: isCompactContent
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to main text container in the compact variant.

members.name: isCompactIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to personas and icons in the compact variant.

members.name: isCompactPersona
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to personas in the compact variant.

members.name: isCompactPersonaContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to a wrapper around personas in the compact variant.

members.name: isCompactRoot
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to root in the compact variant.

members.name: isCompactTimeStamp
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the timestamp in compact mode. This can occur if a host overrides the render behavior to force the timestamp to render.

members.name: personaContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the container of the persona image or activity type icon.

members.name: pulsingBeacon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the root activity item container.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the root activity item container.

members.name: timeStamp
members.descriptionHtml: Styles applied to the timestamp at the end of each activity item.
